name: EZE ZE
text: Although I’m usually not a big fan of chain pizza stores, this one was surprisingly good. Staff was friendly and courteous, food was hot and well prepared. Would definitely eat here again.

name: Jeffrey Keenan
text: I love the hoagies and picked up a small pepperoni pizza today that was great. Speedy deliveries both to my home and business. Friendly employees.

name: meredith wheatley
text: This is a nice local pizza place. Has all the basics and reasonable prices.

name: Bokura
text: Pretty good pizza, never too busy, quick delivery.

name: OasisZero
text: Started ordering from here when we first moved to town, and back then the food was good and they we're the only place that delivered in under an hour. But the food quality and delivery times have gotten worse over the past few months. …More

name: Josh Swimkosky
text: we got our pizza and it seemed quite undercooked, the cheese was falling off the sauce tasted very abnormal, and the pepperoni was almost as if it was just put on. The wings were very disappointing as they were very small

name: Ronald Feiling
text: Best pizza in Carnegie ! the owner Ray is a super guy.

text: My family has has horrible experiences at Fox's. And I tried to give them a benefit of the doubt. Well today changed my opinion. I ordered a large cheese pizza, with bacon on all and black olives on half. At 800pm, was when I placed the …More

text: I'm absolutely baffled how this pizza establishment is still in business, I ordered out to save myself from cooking < should have cooked instead, I thought this a run of the mill pizza joint, How bad could it be? It's BAD!!!! To call this …More

text: I just had the worst experience of my life at a business. My mom is on hospice care and I was trying to order them a pizza. The female employee didn't know if they delivered from Carnegie to Greentree. She said "I've never delivered a pizza …More

text: Just called 3 minutes ago for a small 1 topping half pep half sausage they say that's considered 2 toppings. They don't understand that 2 halfs make 1 whole. Will never order by phone again.

text: Good food plus fast delivery keep it up

text: You would get more business if you picked up your phone! Called five times hung up on me 2 times!

name: Devon Diehl
text: Ordered food here before they closed and they never brought it. Worst place ever.

name: robert bray
text: They claim to close at 10 but frequently close at 9:30 or earlier. The past few Friday's I try to order when I get home at 9:30 only to be told they are in fact closed. The food is ok, no complaints and I live a block away, but despite this, I won't be ordering from them again.
